com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.devicecontrol

Class DeviceControlApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telekom.m2m.cot.restsdk.devicecontrol.DeviceControlApi

  • public class DeviceControlApi
extends Object
    DeviceControl API is used to work with operations.
    Since:
    0.1.0 Created by Patrick Steinert on 31.01.16.

      • DeviceControlApi

        public DeviceControlApi(CloudOfThingsRestClient cloudOfThingsRestClient)
        Internal used constructor.

        Use CloudOfThingsPlatform.getDeviceControlApi() to create an instance.

        Parameters:
        cloudOfThingsRestClient - the configured rest client.
        Since:

    • Method Detail

      • createNewDevice

        @Deprecated
public Operation createNewDevice(Operation operation)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new Device Request to register new devices. As this method is deprecated, use the method createNewDevice(String deviceId) instead.
        Parameters:
        operation - Operation just with the deviceId to register.
        Returns:
        the created operation.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • createNewDevice

        public NewDeviceRequest createNewDevice(String deviceId)
        Creates a new Device Request to register new devices.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - Id for device after registration (e.g. ICCID, IMEI, serial number ...).
        Returns:
        NewDeviceRequest object with response information from the cloud of things. Status is also provided by this object.

      • acceptDevice

        public void acceptDevice(String deviceId)
        Accepts a device after it requested the credentials for the first time.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - the Id of the device to accept.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getOperation

        public Operation getOperation(String operationId)
        Retrieves a certain operation.
        Parameters:
        operationId - Id of the operation to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the Operation as Object or null if not found.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • create

        public Operation create(Operation operation)
        Creates an operation.
        Parameters:
        operation - Operation object with the necessary data (w/o Id).
        Returns:
        the Operation with the created Id.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • update

        public Operation update(Operation operation)
        Updates an existing operation state. If operation Status changes from 'FAILED' with a specific failure reason, the failure reason must be removed by executing the function twice: one time with status failed and failure reason = "" and one time for changing the status In the cloud of things the failure reason will then be ""
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation with new operation state, failure reason if operation state is 'FAILED' Id as existing, not changeable.
        Returns:
        the Operation object.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getOperationCollection

        public OperationCollection getOperationCollection(int resultSize)
        Retrieves a pageable Collection of Operations.
        Parameters:
        resultSize - size of the results (Max. 2000)
        Returns:
        the first page of OperationCollection which can be used to navigate through the found Operations.

      • getOperationCollection

        public OperationCollection getOperationCollection(Filter.FilterBuilder filters,
                                                  int resultSize)
        Retrieves a pageable Collection of Operations filtered by criteria. It provides filtering by Status, AgentId, DeviceId, DateFrom, DateTo
        Parameters:
        filters - filters of Operation attributes.
        resultSize - size of the results (Max. 2000)
        Returns:
        the first page of OperationCollection which can be used to navigate through the found Operations.

      • deleteOperations

        public void deleteOperations(Filter.FilterBuilder filters)
        Deletes a collection of Operations by criteria (Status, AgentId, DeviceId, DateFrom, DateTo).
        Parameters:
        filters - filters of Operation attributes.

      • create

        public BulkOperation create(BulkOperation bulkOperation)
        Creates a bulk operation.
        Parameters:
        bulkOperation - bulk operation object with the necessary data (w/o Id).
        Returns:
        the bulk operation stored in CoT with the created Id.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getBulkOperation

        public BulkOperation getBulkOperation(String id)
        Retrieves a certain bulk operation.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the bulk operation to retrieve.
        Returns:
        a BulkOperation object or null if not found.

      • update

        public void update(BulkOperation bulkOperation)
        Updates an existing bulk operation. Updatable fields: groupId, failedBulkOperationId, startDate, creationRamp, operation
        Parameters:
        bulkOperation - the bulk operation with new values for updatable fields. Id, status, progress are not changeable.
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • getBulkOperationCollection

        public BulkOperationCollection getBulkOperationCollection(int resultSize)
        Retrieves a pageable Collection of BulkOperations.
        Parameters:
        resultSize - size of the results (Max. 2000)
        Returns:
        the first page of BulkOperationCollection which can be used to navigate through the found BulkOperations.

      • deleteBulkOperation

        public void deleteBulkOperation(String bulkOperationId)
        Deletes a bulk operation by provided id. Note: it deletes only bulk operations with statuses ACTIVE or IN_PROGRESS
        Parameters:
        bulkOperationId - the unique identifier.

      • getNotificationConnector

        public CepConnector getNotificationConnector()
        Returns the connector that establishes the real time communication with the notification service.
        Returns:
        CepConnector
